relativeUrl.value: data/2.5/history/city?lat=@{dataset().lat}&lon=@{dataset().lon}&type=hour&start=@{div(sub(ticks(addDays(utcNow(), add(mul(-7, item()), -7))), ticks('1970-01-01T00:00:00Z')), 10000000)}&end=@{div(sub(ticks(addDays(utcNow(), mul(-7, item()))), ticks('1970-01-01T00:00:00Z')), 10000000)}&appid=@{dataset().appid}
